- Add support for CK3 1.7
- Add support for EU4 1.34
- Make mod loading more robust
- Improve save game loading performance (Thanks to Thradius)
- Highlight filter selection in editor
- Make read-only savegames not editable in the editor to avoid confusion
- Format editor keys in a nicer way
- Improve editor filter functionality to match more results
- Fix DPI scaling issues
- Fix export storage functionality not working
- Fix various small memory leaks
- Fix various small bugs
